feed.title: The Machine Learning for Socio-Technical Systems Lab at University of Rhode Island

entry.title: TD STEM Academy Workshop
entry.content: Professor Brown and incoming Graduate student Emmely Trejo Alvarez are hosting a workshop for incoming students this week to learn about AI biases by replicating the COMPAS analysis. Resources are available online
entry.summary: Professor Brown and incoming Graduate student Emmely Trejo Alvarez are hosting a workshop for incoming students this week to learn about AI biases by replicating the COMPAS analysis. Resources are available online

entry.title: Welcome Emmely and Surbhi as the first graduate students!
entry.content: Emmely has continued at URI as a MS student and Surbhi has joined the lab to work on Task Fairness.
entry.summary: Emmely has continued at URI as a MS student and Surbhi has joined the lab to work on Task Fairness.

entry.title: Welcome to New Undergraduate Researchers Marie, Caroline, and CJ
Teaching Software Carpentry at NSBE
entry.content: Dr. Brown taught sw carpentry at NSBE Convention notes from the workshop are online
entry.summary: Dr. Brown taught sw carpentry at NSBE Convention notes from the workshop are online

entry.title: Paper Accepted to 1st ACM SIGKDD Workshop on Ethical Artificial Intelligence
entry.content: Dr. Brown and Surbhi Rathore’s paper “Information Theoretic Framework For Evaluation of Task Level Fairness” was accepted to the 1st ACM SIGKDD Workshop on Ethical Artificial Intelligence! The paper will be presented at the EAI-KDD22 Workshop.
entry.summary: Dr. Brown and Surbhi Rathore’s paper “Information Theoretic Framework For Evaluation of Task Level Fairness” was accepted to the 1st ACM SIGKDD Workshop on Ethical Artificial Intelligence! The paper will be presented at the EAI-KDD22 Workshop.
